nodes.text: A vendor sold antiques at the Colossus marketplace on Castilon. When Torra Doza, daughter of platform owner Captain Imanuel Doza, took an interest in an object he was selling at his stall, he attempted to raise the price from five to twenty credits, causing her to lose interest. The vendor was later bowled over when a gorg Neeku Vozo attempted to purchase for lunch got loose and caused a commotion.
The vendor first appeared in the Star Wars Resistance episode "Secrets and Holograms", and is voiced by Phil LaMarr. He resembles the Legends depiction of the Bothan species.
